duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and review project scope, request for proposals (RFPs), and engineering designs.
Negotiate agreements, administer, and manage consultant services for design, construction management, and inspection.
Manage and provide oversight for the work of professional engineering personnel staff.
Make presentations to City Commissions, the City Council, and Council committees on engineering-related items.
Implement and maintain Federal, State, and local mandates.
Manage projects related to developing City water supply, water main replacements, street improvements, and sewer/storm drain replacements.
Lead a team of engineering professionals, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving project objectives.
Analyze and refine project management processes to ensure efficiency and quality of deliverables.
Manage project budgets, schedules, and resources to ensure successful project completion within scope and timeline.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering (Master's preferred)
